content: Is it possible to do profiling without any extensions to the base FHIR spec?
Maybe something powerful like Observation could cover such requirements for extensions.
Such an pattern might facilitate the separation of business/domain models from the basic model.
Put more stuff in the text element and not in structure. :innocent:
The narrative element? That would be incompatible with the spec.
Narrative can be much richer than the structured data, nothing wrong with that.. and accordance with the spec.
Alright, it seems my understanding is the problem. Thanks.
